content.en: Algorithmic schizophrenia treatment: Clinicians often do not follow evidence-based algorithms for treating non-responsive schizophrenia patients, according to a study. However, the Texas Medication Algorithm Project provides recommendations for antipsychotic treatment of schizophrenia. Another study suggests that a simple algorithm can be used for the pharmacological treatment of schizophrenia. Overall, algorithms can be helpful in guiding treatment decisions for schizophrenia, but their implementation by clinicians varies.
content.da: Algoritmisk skizofrenibehandling: Klinikere følger ofte ikke evidensbaserede algoritmer til behandling af ikke-responderende skizofrenipatienter, ifølge en undersøgelse. Imidlertid giver Texas Medication Algorithm Project anbefalinger til antipsykotisk behandling af skizofreni. En anden undersøgelse antyder, at en simpel algoritme kan bruges til farmakologisk behandling af skizofreni. Samlet set kan algoritmer være nyttige til at vejlede behandlingsbeslutninger for skizofreni, men deres implementering af klinikere varierer.
